results.definition: the direction or path along which something moves or along which it lies
specifically design a product, event, or activity for a certain public
have an ambitious plan or a lofty goal
an anticipated outcome that is intended or that guides your planned actions
examples: it was created with the conscious aim of answering immediate needs

results.definition: move into a desired direction of discourse
the goal intended to be attained (and which is believed to be attainable)
intend (something) to move towards a certain goal
examples: He aimed his fists towards his opponent's face
I aim to arrive at noon

results.definition: point or cause to go (blows, weapons, or objects such as photographic equipment) towards
examples: Please don't aim at your little brother!

results.definition: direct (a remark) toward an intended goal
examples: She wanted to aim a pun

results.definition: the action of directing something at an object
